template<class T >
void vnl_matrix_update ( vnl_matrix< T > &  M,
const vnl_vector< T > &  a,
const vnl_vector< T > &  b 
) [inline]

Perform rank 1 update of M: M+=(a*b').

Requires a.size()==M.rows(), b.size()==M.columns()
